item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

April 18, 2011's location is:

Koji - New Haven

Late night sushi bar Koji opened last spring on Temple Street in downtown New Haven. The bar offers specialty cocktails, saki, beer and wine. The food menu offers more than just sushi. Some of you may be familiar with their sister venue in Hartford.

The Manager (Darren) has offered us the following Special:

$5 Top Shelf Drinks

AJ will host this happy hour and can be reached at 315-345-9348 should you have any issues.

Please RSVP for this event so we can give them an accurate heads up.

For Happy Hour Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and/or we're most likely the largest group at the Bar on a Monday.
item.name: Happy Hour - Koji
